snippet: A daunting new barrier is beginning to loom over Hungary's southern border, capable of delivering electric shocks to unwanted migrants and armed with heat sensors, cameras, and loudspeakers that blare in several languages....

headline.main: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court

lead_paragraph: A daunting new barrier is beginning to loom over Hungary's southern border, capable of delivering electric shocks to unwanted migrants and armed with heat sensors, cameras, and loudspeakers that blare in several languages.
